!You must pass individual tests to obtain marks. The *Mark of the Challenger* is only given to those who pass the Trial of the Challenger. You must be above *level 35* to take the test. And to take the Trial of the Challenger, visit *Kash of Dion Castle Town*. The *Mark of Fate* is only given to those who pass the Testimony of Fate. You must be above *level 37* to take the test. To take the Testimony of Fate, go to *Giran Castle Town and meet Dark Elven Magister Kaira*. And finally the *Mark of the Duelist* is only given to those who pass the Test of the Duelist. You must be above *level 39* to take the test. To take the Test of the Duelist, meet *Duelist Kaien of the Town of Oren*. [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30474/06.htm|Return]Â
